translation: 以利亚临时装配的特斯拉加农炮
以利亚的高级激光引导电能步枪
核电超增殖反应堆阿尔法型
能量电池, 优化型 (谨慎回收)
微型核聚变电池, 优化型 (谨慎回收)
微型核聚变电池, 优化
荷电充能包, 优化型 (谨慎回收)
火焰喷射器燃料, 优化型 (谨慎回收)
微型核聚变电池, 过充型
微型核聚变电池 过充
微型核聚变电池, 满充型
微型核聚变电池 满充
荷电充能包, 过充型
荷电充能包, 满充型
荷电充能包, 批发型
微型核聚变电池, 批发型
微型核聚变电池 批发
火焰喷射器燃料, 自制型
12铅径, 马格南4号鹿弹 (手装)
20铅径, 马格南3号鹿弹 (手装)
受辐射的苏格兰威士忌
贩卖机编码 - "微型核聚变电池"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。
预购13号避难所水壶任务

original: You gain a non-addictive subdermal Turbo (chem) injector. This perk may be taken twice, with the second rank increasing the effect from 2 to 3 seconds and the uses per day from 2 to 3. [Activated in the Pip-Boy inventory.]
translation: 你获得了一个不会上瘾的加速剂（药物）注射器。这个特长能升2级，第2级能把效果从2秒提高为3秒，把每天的使用次数从2次提升到3次 [已在哔哔小子物品栏启用]

original: You gain +15 lbs. to your carrying capacity, but suffer a -1 to all attributes any time the weight you're carrying drops below 75 lbs.
translation: 你能多负载+15磅的东西！但当你背着的东西少于75磅时，你的所有属性-1。

original: No one's going to put you out to pasture 'cause you're going to stay young (and level 21) forever! You'll never again become addicted to chems, and they'll last twice as long... but after 21 you can kiss experience, perks, and skill points goodbye!
translation: 多亏了执法者5号罗根的疏忽，再也没有人让你去退休了，因为你青春永驻（永远保持在21级）！你再也不会因嗑药而上瘾，而且药物持续时间是以前的两倍！但是，你不得不向21级以后的经验、特长、技能点说再见了！（致敬电影Logan‘s Run，逃离地下天堂）

original: Your knowledge of robotic components allows you to break them more easily and salvage their mechanical corpses. You have a +25% chance to score critical hits against robots, and you'll also find more useful components on robots you destroy.
translation: 你积累了大量关于机器人结构的知识，现在你能更轻易破坏它们并重新回收它们身上的机械零件。你增加了25%对机器人的暴击率，并且在已摧毁的机器人身上将获得更多有用的组件。

original: You're so sneaky that you can sneak even with your Pip-Boy light on! Any time the Pip-Boy light is on, you gain a sneak bonus to offset the light's sneak penalty.
translation: 你真狡猾，现在就算你的哔哔小子开着灯你也能正常潜行了！如果哔哔小子的灯亮着，你将获得一个潜行奖励以抵消灯光造成的潜行惩罚。

original: Maybe you were bad once, but you ain't like that now. Your Karma has been reset to 0, you regenerate AP 25% faster, and your attack speed is increased by 20%. You are also immune to critical hits. (Requires Bad Karma.)
translation: 或许你曾经是个坏人，但已经洗心革面了。你的业力已经被重置为0，你的AP再生速度提高25%，并且你的攻击速度提高了20%，同时你将免疫暴击。(需要邪恶的业力)

original: Your storied past has fallen from memory 'cause everyone thought you died. Your Karma is reset, you inflict +10% damage, and for every 100 points of Karma, you gain 10 Health. You are also immune to critical hits. (Requires Good Karma.)
translation: 你的传奇故事已经随风而逝，因为人们都以为你已经死了。你的业力将重置，你造成的伤害+10%，并且每100点业力将转换成10点生命值，同时你将免疫暴击。(需要善良的业力)

original: You've had lots of close calls. Whenever you finish a fight with less than 25% Health, your Luck increases by +4 for 3 minutes. You are also immune to critical hits, and your own critical hits inflict +50% damage. (Requires Neutral Karma.)
translation: 你有许多死里逃生的经历，如果你在生命值低于25%的情况下结束战斗，在接下来的3分钟内你的幸运值+4。同时你将免疫暴击，并且你自己的暴击伤害+50%。(需要中立的业力)

original: Minor bonus to critically hit with Hatchets, Throwing Hatchets, Tomahawks, Proton Axes, Proton Throwing Axes, Protonic Inversal Axes, and Protonic Inversal Throwing Axes.
translation: 使用斧头、投掷斧、战斧、质子斧、质子飞斧、反质子斧和反质子飞斧时获得少量暴击加成。

original: With each rank of this perk, all of your Explosives weapons do an additional 10% damage and have 10% larger area of effect.
translation: 这个特长每升一级, 所有爆破类武器都能提升20%的伤害，同时提高10%的爆炸范围。

original: The Ninja perk grants you the power of the fabled shadow warriors. When attacking with either Melee or Unarmed, you gain a +15% critical chance on every strike. Sneak attack criticals do 25% more damage than normal.
translation: “忍者”这个特长将赋予你传说中暗影武士的力量。施展徒手或近战攻击时，你的暴击率提高15%。潜行状态下打出的暴击伤害提高25%。

original: With the Strong Back perk, you can carry 25 more pounds of equipment.
translation: 拥有善背这一额外技能，你就可以多背25磅的物品。

original: With the Lead Belly perk, you take 50% less radiation when consuming irradiated food and drink. You are also able to eat raw animal meat without suffering STR loss.
translation: 拥有“铅肚皮”这个特长，在饮用放射性的水源时, 你受到的辐射量会减少50％。同时，你吃生肉不再降低力量。

original: In combat, you do +15% damage against female opponents. Outside of combat, you'll sometimes have access to unique dialogue options when dealing with the opposite sex.
translation: 战斗中, 你对所有女性目标的伤害+15％。平日里，和某些异性对话时会出现特殊选项。

original: In combat, you do +15% damage against female opponents. Outside of combat, you'll sometimes have access to unique dialogue options when dealing with the same sex.
translation: 在战斗中，你对女性敌人的伤害+15%。平日里，你在与某些同性对象谈话时可以开启特殊选项。

original: You do 20% more damage when using any revolver, lever-action firearm, dynamite, knife, or hatchet.
translation: 当你使用左轮手枪、杠杆式火器、炸药、刀或斧头时，你造成的伤害提高20%。

original: Meltdown causes foes killed by your plasma weapons to give off a corona of harmful energy. Note: this can cause a chain reaction.
translation: “熔毁”特长会使被你用能量武器杀死的敌人身上爆发出有害的能量波。注意，这可能引发连锁反应。

original: All Melee Weapons (except thrown) and Unarmed attacks have a chance of knocking your target down.
translation: 所有的近战武器（除了投掷武器）和徒手攻击都有机会将目标打晕。

original: Piercing Strike makes all of your Unarmed and Melee Weapons (including thrown) negate 15 points of Damage Threshold on the target.
translation: “穿刺打击”会让你的徒手和近战攻击（包括投掷武器）抵消掉目标的15点伤害减免。

original:
COMPANIONS ONLY
* Mult Weap DAM 0.25
* Mult Target DT 0.25 (broken, requires engine-level fix)
* Decrease Carry Weight 75
* Increase DR 33%
translation:
仅用于同伴
* 武器伤害乘数 0.25
* 目标伤害减免乘数 0.25 (已损坏, 需要引擎层面的修复)
* 降低负重 75
* 提高伤害抗性 33%

original: The slayer walks the earth! The speed of all Melee Weapons and Unarmed attacks is increased by 30%.
translation: 你是世上一流的屠夫！所有近战武器和徒手攻击的速度上升30%。

original: Your martial might is truly legendary. You do a large amount of additional damage through enemy blocks with all Melee Weapons and Unarmed attacks.
translation: 你的勇武万夫莫敌。在施展近战与徒手攻击时，你对正在格挡的敌人造成的伤害将大幅增加。

original: You gain +10 Damage Threshold against all Melee Weapons and Unarmed attacks and cannot be knocked down in combat.
translation: 你对所有近战和徒手攻击的伤害减免+10点，并且无法在战斗中被击倒。

original: You're just so excited about plasma that you can't (magnetically) contain yourself! The AP costs for all plasma weapons (including Plasma Grenades) are reduced by 20%. You also attack 20% faster with the same weapons.
translation: 你醉心于等离子的魅力，仿佛它的磁力吸引着你，让你无法自拔！所有的等离子武器（包括等离子手雷）的行动点消耗下降20%。同时，你使用这些武器的攻击速度加快20%。

original: When you're deep in enemy territory, you just start chucking grenades and hope for the best. All Explosives have a 25% larger area of effect.
translation: 你一深入敌阵，就开始四处丢雷，希望能炸出一道亮丽的风景线。所有爆破武器的杀伤范围提高25%。

original: Elijah obviously intended this to go to Veronica, but you earned it, right?\n\nYou've learned Elijah's secret technique and your Melee Weapon Critical Hits now do 25% more damage.
translation: 以利亚明显想把这招传授给维罗妮卡，但这是你应得的，对吧？\n\n你学会了以利亚的近战秘笈，你的近战武器暴击将额外造成25%的伤害。

original: Just good, honest infantry work! You do 20% more damage with 9mm and .45 Auto Pistols and SMGs, Service Rifles, Assault Carbines, Battle Rifles, Light Machine Guns, Frag Grenades, Grenade Rifles and Launchers, and Combat Knives.
translation: 你的步兵经历让你受益匪浅！在使用9mm手枪和冲锋枪、.45自动手枪和冲锋枪、军用步枪、突击卡宾枪、神射卡宾枪、战斗步枪、轻机枪、破片手雷、榴弹枪、榴弹发射器以及战斗匕首时，你造成的伤害增加25%。

original: Any living creature you kill has a 15% chance to have the potent healing items Thin Red Paste or Blood Sausage when looted.
translation: 你见人吃人，见鬼吃鬼！你杀死任何生物时，有15%几率会掉落治疗品稀血酱或血肠。

original:
In order to heal a crippled limb, you have three choices: sleep in a bed, find a doctor, or use a Stimpak to heal yourself. In Hardcore Mode, you may only heal crippled limbs by using Doctor's Bags or by visiting a doctor for medical care.

Stimpaks can be used for general healing (which will also slightly heal crippling damage), or they can be applied directly to a limb to heal crippling damage.

To heal a crippled limb directly using a Stimpak, navigate to the Stats screen in your Pip-Boy, then press &sXBXBtn; to switch to Limb mode. Now you can use &sXBLStick; to select a limb, and &sXBABtn; to use a Stimpak on the selected limb.

There are several different kinds of Stimpaks in the wasteland, and the count shown in the Stats screen represents the total of all the variants you are currently carrying. When you use a Stimpak in this screen, your weakest variant will be consumed first.

In Hardcore Mode, you may only heal crippled limbs by using Doctor's Bags or by visiting a doctor for medical care.
translation:
为了治疗残废的肢体，你有三种选择：在床上睡觉，找个医生，或使用治疗针来自己医治。

治疗针能被用来进行通常的治疗（那也会稍微地治疗到残废造成的伤害），或者它们也能被直接应用在躯体部位上来治疗残废伤害。

想直接用治疗针治疗残废的肢体，在你的哔哔小子中切换到状态窗口，然后点击&sXBXBtn; 来切换到肢体模式。现在你能用&sXBLThumb; 来选择一个部位，再按&sXBABtn; 在选中部位使用一根治疗针。

废土上有几种不同的治疗针，状态窗口中显示的数量代表你当前携带的所有治疗针变体的总和。在此窗口中使用治疗针时，最弱的变体将首先被消耗。

在硬核模式中，你只能通过使用医疗包或看医生来治疗残废的肢体。

original:
You can be exposed to radiation either directly from the environment, or by ingesting irradiated food or water. A small amount of radiation will not hurt you, but as your accumulated exposure goes up, you will begin to suffer ill effects, including death, eventually.

Radiation Poisoning Effects:

* 400 rads: -1 EN
* 550 rads: -2 EN, -1 AG
* 700 rads: -3 EN, -2 AG, -1 ST
* 850 rads: -3 EN, -2 AG, -2 ST
* 1000 rads: Death!

Radiation Poisoning does not wear off, but can be healed by a doctor, or by taking RadAway. You can also protect yourself ahead of time by taking Rad-X, which increases your Radiation Resistance.

Your accumulated radiation exposure is displayed in your Pip-Boy, in the Status section of the Stats tab.
translation:
你会因为接触被污染的环境，或摄入放射性的食物或水而受到辐射。小剂量的辐射不会伤害你，但是当你累计的辐射超过一定限度，你就会患上辐射病，重者可能导致死亡。

辐射病效果：

* 400 辐射: -1 耐力
* 550 辐射: -2 耐力, -1 敏捷
* 700 辐射: -3 耐力, -2 敏捷, -1 力量
* 850 辐射: -3 耐力, -2 敏捷, -2 力量
* 1000 辐射: 挂了！

辐射病不会自动痊愈，但能被医生治好，服用辐特宁也可以消除病症。你也可以通过服用放射线-X来预防辐射，那会增强你的辐射抵抗力。

你受到的累计辐射量会在哔哔小子上显示出来，就在状态选项卡的辐射分项上。

original: Veronica has received the Elijah's Last Words perk.\n\nShe has learned a secret Melee Weapon and Unarmed technique that increases her damage by 25%% and gives her a 25%% chance to knock down enemies.
translation: 维罗妮卡获得了特长“以利亚的遗言”。\n\n她学会了一种近战武器攻击秘技，使得攻击伤害提升25%，并且有25%的概率可以将敌人击倒。

original: You have gained the I Never Axed for This perk (Rank %.0f)
translation: 你获得了“多此一斧”的特长 (等级 %.0f)

original:
Apparel can consist of many different types of gear ranging from clothing and armor to sunglasses and hats.

* DR and DT: Apparel grants DR and DT to protect from damage. The totals displayed at the top of your Pip-Boy are a combination of all your equipped armor, in addition to any bonuses from perks or chems. DR represents the percentage reduction of all incoming damage, and is applied first. Your DT value is then directly subtracted from the remaining damage, although even the thickest armor will still let a small amount of damage through.

* CND: Apparel's Condition (CND) affects how much protection it provides. Apparel above 50% CND provides maximum protection and only needs to be maintained.

* Light/Medium/Heavy: Medium and Heavy apparel will slow characters down when equipped.

* Repair: This option opens the Repair submenu, which allows apparel to be repaired by salvaging parts from similar items.
translation:
服装由各种不同的部分组成，从衣物和装甲，到墨镜和帽子。

伤害减免（DT）和伤害抗性（DR）：服装可提供伤害抗性和伤害减免，保护您免受伤害。哔哔小子顶部所显示的总值是所身着的全部服装及特长或药物所带来的加成的总和。伤害抗性代表对所有伤害的百分比减免，在计算伤害时首先应用，然后伤害会直接扣去伤害减免值。即使是最密实的装甲，也会有少量伤害穿透过去。

耐久（CND）：服装的耐久度会影响其所能提供的保护。耐久在50%以上的服装能够提供最大限度的保护，并且只需要少量的保养即可。

* 轻甲/中甲/重甲：中甲和重甲装备后会降低角色的移动速度。

* 修理：这一选项会打开修理子菜单，可以用类似物品上的部件来修补当前所选择的服装。

original:
Welcome to Hardcore Mode! There are three basic needs that Hardcore Mode requires you to monitor: dehydration (H2O), starvation (FOD), and sleep deprivation (SLP). Each of these needs must be monitored and kept in check or you will suffer penalties and, in extreme cases, death.

Your needs are continually ticking away and can be monitored on the Status screen of your Pip-Boy. When you start to suffer ill-effects from neglected needs, your HUD will display the corresponding code for that need. Be aware that waiting, sleeping, and Fast Travel will also affect your needs. If performing any of these activities would result in death, you will be prevented from doing so.

* Dehydration (H20) - Dehydration increases at a faster pace than starvation or sleep deprivation. It can be relieved by drinking water or eating certain types of food.

* Starvation (FOD) - The onset of starvation is slower than dehydration, but quicker than sleep deprivation. It can be relieved by eating food.

* Sleep Deprivation (SLP) - Sleep deprivation is the most low-maintenance of the basic needs. Though a few chems and drinks can help offset sleep deprivation, nothing beats sleep itself.
translation:
欢迎来到硬核模式！硬核模式中你必须时刻注意三种需求：口渴（H2O），饥饿（FOD）和困倦（SLP）。你必须时刻注意满足这三种需求，否则你的身体状态就会受到影响，在极端情况下甚至可能导致死亡。

你的需求会随着时间持续上升，可以从哔哔小子的状态栏上看到。当你忽视了需求而受到负面状态的影响时，你的右下角界面会提醒你满足对应的需求。需要注意的是，等待、睡眠和快速旅行也会影响你的需求。如果这些行动会导致人物死亡，你将会被禁止此类行动。

* 口渴（H2O）- 口渴度的上升速度比饥饿和困倦快。可以通过喝水或食用特定的食物来降低。

* 饥饿（FOD）- 饥饿的速度要比口渴慢，但比困倦快。可以通过摄入食物来缓解。

* 困倦（SLP）- 困倦是基本需求中最难以维持的。虽然药物和饮料可以帮助抵御倦意，但没有什么比好好睡上一觉更能解决问题。

original: You have received the specialized training needed to more effectively use Power Armor. Power armor now weights less when worn.
translation: 你已经接受了更有效地使用动力装甲所需的专门训练。现在动力装甲在穿着时重量减轻。

original:
In order to heal a crippled limb, you have three choices: sleep in a bed, find a doctor, or use a Stimpak to heal yourself. In Hardcore Mode, you may only heal crippled limbs by using Doctor's Bags or by visiting a doctor for medical care.

Stimpaks can be used for general healing (which will also slightly heal crippling damage), or they can be applied directly to a limb to heal crippling damage.

To heal a crippled limb directly using a Stimpak, navigate to the Stats screen in your Pip-Boy, then left-click on a limb to use a Stimpak on that limb.

There are several different kinds of Stimpaks in the wasteland, and the count shown in the Stats screen represents the total of all the variants you are currently carrying. When you use a Stimpak in this screen, your weakest variant will be consumed first.
translation:
为了治疗残废的肢体，你有三种选择：在床上睡觉，找个医生，或使用治疗针来自救。

治疗针不仅能用来进行通常的医疗（也会稍微地治疗残废），也可以直接用在肢体部位上来治疗残废。

想直接用治疗针治疗残废的肢体，先在你的哔哔小子中切换到状态窗口，然后左键点击某个身体部位，就能在那个部位上使用治疗针。

废土上有几种不同的治疗针，状态窗口中显示的数量代表你当前携带的所有治疗针变体的总和。在此窗口中使用治疗针时，最弱的变体将首先被消耗。
反器材步枪碳纤维枪身
反器材步枪改进型枪栓
突击卡宾枪强化型机匣
等离子护卫者大容量端子
等离子护卫者改进稳定器
等离子手枪高能电离器
等离子手枪粒子加速器
等离子手枪电池回收器
三束激光步枪光学聚焦器
三束激光步枪强化电容
三束激光步枪大容量端子
荷电充能包, 优化型
微型核聚变电池, 优化型
火焰喷射器燃料, 优化型

original: Kill Super Mutants with 5.56mm Pistols, Plasma Defenders, Plasma Grenades, Power Fists, Rippers, or the Bozar.
translation: 用等离子手雷，动力拳套，开膛手，等离子护卫者，无名枪，包子或5.56mm手枪杀死超级变种人。

original: Kill President Kimball with any One-Handed Pistol.
translation: 用任何单手手枪杀死金博尔总统。

original: Cripple Caesar's head with Throwing Spears.
Dyin' Ain't Much of a Living
Kill members of NCR or Legion hit squads with weapons affected by the Cowboy perk.
translation: 使用受牛仔特长影响的武器杀死NCR游骑兵和军团刺客。

original: Cause damage with Hatchets, Throwing Hatchets, Tomahawks, Proton Axes, Proton Throwing Axes, Protonic Inversal Axes, and Protonic Inversal Throwing Axes.
translation: 使用斧头、投掷斧、战斧、质子斧、质子飞斧、反质子斧和反质子飞斧造成伤害。

original: Do damage with Gun Runners' Arsenal (GRA) Weapons.
translation: 使用军火贩子武器库中的武器对敌人造成伤害。

original: Kill Chairmen, White Gloves, or Omertas with any submachine gun, light machine gun, or minigun.
translation: 用任何冲锋枪、轻机枪或转轮机枪杀死会长帮、黑手党或白手套成员。

original: Kill Caesar with a Knife or Combat Knife.
translation: 用小刀或战斗匕首杀死凯撒。

original: Kill adult Deathclaws with .22 Pistols, Switchblades, Boxing Tape, Recharger Rifles, or Dynamite.
translation: 用.22手枪，弹簧刀，拳击布带，充能步枪，或炸药杀死成年死亡爪。

original: Kill Benny with his own gun, Maria.
translation: 用班尼的“玛利亚”杀死班尼。

original: Kill Fiends, Vipers, or Jackals with Tire Irons, Baseball Bats, Lead Pipes, Machetes, .44 Magnum Revolvers, or Sawed-Off Shotguns.
translation: 用卸胎棒、棒球棍、铅管、砍刀、.44马格南左轮枪或截短霰弹枪杀死恶魔帮，毒蛇帮或豺狼帮的匪徒。

original: Kill Animals with any Fat Man or Fat Mines.
translation: 用核弹或核子地雷杀死动物。

original: You Don't Belong In This World!
Kill Abominations with Katanas, Dynamite, Machetes, Throwing Spears, Throwing Knives, and Throwing Hatchets.
translation: 用武士刀、炸药、大刀、投矛、飞刀或投斧杀死变种野怪。
右臂残废后使用霰弹枪。

original: Cause damage with unique Mojave Wasteland weapons.
translation: 用莫哈维废土的独特武器造成伤害。

original: Kill any named Legion members with Hunting Revolvers, Ranger Sequoias, Brush Guns, Service Rifles, Hunting Rifles, or Cowboy Repeaters.
translation: 用狩猎左轮枪、游骑兵的红杉木、灌木丛枪、军用步枪、猎枪或牛仔连发枪杀死任何有名字的军团成员。

original: Kill any named NCR Ranger or commissioned officer (Lieutenant, Captain, Major, Colonel, General) with Machetes, Rippers, Chainsaws, Throwing Spears, or Ballistic Fists.
translation: 用砍刀、开膛手、链锯、投矛或铳枪拳套杀死任何有名字的NCR游骑兵或现役军官（中尉，上尉，少校，上校，将军）。

original: Kill Mr. House with a 9 Iron or Nephi's Golf Driver.
translation: 用九号铁杆或尼法的高尔夫球杆杀死豪斯先生。

original: The Same Could Be Said of All Religious Weapons
translation: 对所有宗教武器都能这么说

original: Kill Feral Ghouls with Maria, Gehenna, A Light Shining in Darkness, and Holy Frag Grenades.
translation: 用玛利亚，焦热炼狱，耀夜之光，神圣破片手雷杀死狂尸鬼。

original: Kill Mojave Wasteland Cazadores with Tin Grenades, Long Fuse Dynamite, and Time Bombs.
translation: 用锡罐手雷、定时炸弹或长引线黄色炸药杀死莫哈维废土的猎蜂。

original: Kill Mojave Wasteland Mr. Gutsys and Sentry Bots with Brass Knuckles, Spiked Knuckles, Tire Irons, and Lead Pipes.
translation: 用铜指虎，刺指虎，卸胎棒或铅管杀死莫哈韦废土的勇敢先生和铁卫兵。
小巴斯特的商队牌牌组
戴尔·巴顿的商队牌牌组
